products.name: Navy Cord Check Starlight Midi Dress
products.description: An autumn-ready take on our stellar style, Starlight. We're obsessed with her soft gathering, balloon sleeves and pretty line of covered buttons – she's even got pockets. Style yours with heeled boots.
